Posts.EditableText:
Own your very own shop by buying from different stores like a grocery store... you can sale whatever you'd like whether it be categorized like only grocery store items or if you want a shop that sales random things like pizza and computers... this is the game for you!
Your shop is small at the beginning but as you progress, it expands more and more.
This game is still in ALPHA and lots of stuff needs to be added. Think of it as more of a Proof of Concept for now.
I didn't use Brand names due to copyright reasons. 
[b:32nz44f7]Current Version:[/b:32nz44f7]  ALPHA v0.0.1b
-Fixed the Dairy department
[url:32nz44f7]http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ogtdvcaihucgjfa9cj68ea/shop-shaper-alpha[/url:32nz44f7]

Own your very own shop by buying from different stores like a grocery store... you can sale whatever you'd like whether it be categorized like only grocery store items or if you want a shop that sales random things like pizza and computers... this is the game for you!
Your shop is small at the beginning but as you progress, it expands more and more.
This game is still in ALPHA and lots of stuff needs to be added. Think of it as more of a Proof of Concept for now.
I didn't use Brand names due to copyright reasons.
